sourcesContent:
export const FETCH_USERS_WITH_PHONENUMBERS = `
SELECT
u.id,
u.first_name,
u.last_name,
u.email,
u.is_active,
u.created_at,
json_strip_nulls(json_agg(
        json_build_object(
                'id', upn.id,
                'phone_number', upn.phone_number,
                'type', upn.type
            )
    )
)As phone_numbers

FROM users u
LEFT JOIN user_phone_numbers upn on u.id = upn.user_id
where u.is_active=true
GROUP BY u.id
`;

export const FETCH_USERS_WITH_PHONENUMBERS = `
SELECT
u.id,
u.first_name,
u.last_name,
u.email,
u.is_active,
u.created_at,
json_strip_nulls(json_agg(
        json_build_object(
                'id', upn.id,
                'phone_number', upn.phone_number,
                'type', upn.type
            )
    )
)As phone_numbers

FROM users u
LEFT JOIN user_phone_numbers upn on u.id = upn.user_id
where u.is_active=true
GROUP BY u.id
`;
